verses.text: And it came to pass the same \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \add and\add* in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azur|strong="H5809"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, which \add was\add* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto me in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in the \w presence|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w speaketh|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

Within two \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* will I bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* into this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* took \w away|strong="H3947"\w* from this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* them to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*:\f + \fr 28.3 \ft two…: Heb. two years of days\f*

And I will bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Jeconiah|strong="H3204"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, with all the \w captives|strong="H1546"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.\f + \fr 28.4 \ft captives: Heb. captivity\f*

¶ Then the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* in the \w presence|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and in the \w presence|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

Even the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* so: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which thou hast \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w*, to bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and all that is carried away \w captive|strong="H1473"\w*, from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* into this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

Nevertheless \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou now this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, and in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;

The \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that have been \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee of \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* both against \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, and against \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*, of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and of \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*.

The \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* which \w prophesieth|strong="H5012"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, when the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* shall come to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, \add  \+w then|strong="H0227"\+w*\add* shall the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* be \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w truly|strong="H0571"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him.

¶ Then \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H4133"\w* from off the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah’s|strong="H3414"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* it.

And \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* in the \w presence|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Even so will I \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* from the \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* of all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* within the space of two \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. And the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

¶ Then the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \add the prophet\add*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* had \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H4133"\w* from off the \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* of the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Thou hast \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w yokes|strong="H4133"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*; but thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for them \w yokes|strong="H4133"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; I have \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* upon the \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* of all these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*; and they shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him: and I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* also.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* unto \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* now, \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*; The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee; but thou makest this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Behold, I will \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* thee from off the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*: this \w year|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, because thou hast \w taught|strong="H1696"\w* \w rebellion|strong="H5627"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 28.16  t rebellion: Heb. revolt *
So \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* the same \w year|strong="H8141"\w* in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.
